mn72:3.2: evaṃdiṭṭhi → evaṃdiṭṭhī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, km, mr)
mn72:13.3: moghamaññan’ti vadesi → moghamaññantīti vadesi (bj); moghamaññanti iti vadesi (?)
mn72:21.3: pheggū palujjeyyuṃ → pheggu palujjeyya (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sākhāpalāsā palujjeyyuṃ → sākhāpalāsaṃ palujjeyya (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
